data.title: 1.Organizational structure of risk management
data.content: The Company authorizes all relevant departments to take charge of various environmental changes and assess the impact of these changes in accordance with their functions and powers, and submit them to the management. Then, the General Manager is the convener, and each relevant unit is responsible for discussing various countermeasures according to the nature of its business to reduce the impact on the Company. The organizational structure of various risk management is as follows:

content.title: (1) President's Office
content.content: Responsible for business decision planning to reduce strategic risk。

content.title: (2) Financial & Account Dept.
content.content: Responsible for financial scheduling and application, and establish a hedging mechanism to reduce financial risks.

content.title: (3) Sales Div.
content.content: Responsible for marketing strategies, product promotion, and mastering market trends to reduce business operational risks.

content.title: (4) Packaging Mold Div. & Automation Equipment Div.
content.content: Responsible for research and development of new technologies, new products, procurement strategies, and supply control to reduce inventory operation risks.

content.title: (5) Administration Dept.
content.content: Responsible for company general affairs, network information security and protective measures to reduce administrative security risks.

content.title: (6) Internal Audit Office
content.content: Responsible for the revision and implementation of the internal control system to strengthen the internal control function, ensure its continuous effectiveness, achieve the reliability of financial reporting, the effect and efficiency of operations, and comply with relevant laws and regulations.

data.title: (1)Management structure
data.content: Main administrative Div. of the Company is responsible for the management of information security, and is equipped with a dedicated information security personnel and an external information security management team for assistance. Meetings are held quarterly to review and decide the status of information security and information protection, and implement the effectiveness of information security management measures.

content.title: Safety goal ：
content.content: Targeted and regularly reviewed based on confidentiality, integrity and availability.

content.title: Safety Commitment ：
content.content: Comply with applicable safety regulations and requirements and other requirements signed by the company.

content.title: Continuous improvement ：
content.content: Continuously improve safety management through audits.

The company has established documents related to the "Internal Control System for Electronic Data Processing". All employees must strictly follow the safety regulations and requirements, and implement maintenance safety matters to ensure the safety of customers, the company and facilities.

The company has strict protection measures for all system development and maintenance, data access, backup mechanism, virus and network intrusion. The computer room is equipped with automatic fire extinguishing system, uninterruptible power supply system, access control system and video monitoring measures.

data.title: (4)Join the Joint Defense Organization
data.content: In March 2022, the company passed the audit of the Taiwan Computer Network Crisis Handling and Coordination Center ("TWCERT/CC") and obtained the membership of the "Taiwan CERT/CSIRT Alliance". Information and information sharing channels, thereby enhancing the overall information security joint defense and adaptability of the enterprise.

data.title: (5) Resources invested in security management of financial communication

content.title: a
content.content: Update of network hardware equipment such as firewall, network management type set line.

content.title: b
content.content: Software systems such as backup management software, VPN authentication and encryption softwar.

content.title: c
content.content: Telecommunications services such as intrusion prevention services.

content.title: d
content.content: Manpower input such as: daily system status inspection, weekly regular backup and execution of backup media off-site storage, annual system disaster recovery execution drill, annual internal audit of information cycle, accountant audit.

data.content: As of 2022, there has been no customer complaint caused by the leakage of business data or personal data.
